about_the_game:
Degu Squad is a top-down shooting adventure game. On your way to the destination to perform the mission, there are many enemies that will stop you. You can try to avoid them or defeat them, and cooperate with your comrades to destroy the enemy's base. Rescue the kidnapped hostages and complete a series of tasks. The game is relatively lightweight and the total time is about 2-3 hours. The game style is bright and relaxed, and the violent elements are downplayed.

In the game, you need to control different characters to perform different tasks, and use firearms, cold weapons or other weapons to deal with the enemies.
detailed_description:
Degu Squad is a top-down shooting adventure game. On your way to the destination to perform the mission, there are many enemies that will stop you. You can try to avoid them or defeat them, and cooperate with your comrades to destroy the enemy's base. Rescue the kidnapped hostages and complete a series of tasks. The game is relatively lightweight and the total time is about 2-3 hours. The game style is bright and relaxed, and the violent elements are downplayed.

In the game, you need to control different characters to perform different tasks, and use firearms, cold weapons or other weapons to deal with the enemies.
name: Degu Squad

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: i7-3770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX660
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: i7-10700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1660
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Important personnel were kidnapped by terrorists. When no one dared to come forward, the Degu Squad received the rescue plan. The special operations team of more than a dozen people needs perfect cooperation to complete such an arduous task. Are you ready?
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
